name: Brigand: Panama
storyline:
Four years after the events of Oaxaca, the Pirate Kingdoms are ravaged by civil war, and another wave of refugees is crashing into the mainland to escape the bloodshed. Ozee and his crew are bound for Panama, where there is rumor of an old Baroque facility deep in the jungle that contains technology that will help turn the tides and establish dominance over the islands once again.

The player must stop them, or help them. Either way.
